name: asbind
description: Library to handle passing high-level data structures between AssemblyScript and JavaScript
author: Aaron Turner

scripts.asbuild:untouched: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug --runtime full
scripts.asbuild:optimized: npx asc assembly/index.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --runtime full
